meanings.definition: To make periodic payments on an annuity.
meanings.sent1: He annuitized his pension fund, receiving monthly checks.
meanings.sent2: They annuitized the lottery winnings, ensuring a steady income stream.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel annuitized its acorn stash, burying one each day.
meanings.sent4: The sun annuitized its warmth, spreading it evenly throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: The river annuitized its flow, maintaining a constant speed.
